column5: Our house is approx. 1/4 mile from the beach. It's a spacious and well equipped townhouse, close to the beach, Schlitterbahn, Nat'l Seashore, and great fishing. It's good for business travelers and families. ABSOLUTELY NO PETS. 10 PEOPLE.  All reservations subject to CofCC Hotel Tax and TX Hotel Tax totaling 15% and additional $350.00 refundable security deposit which will be added upon booking.  $% tax = $431.25 nightly ($% tax = 603.75 nightly ($603)
